backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining admin auth, vehicle CMS types, visitor tracking fields, and storage/authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to the new structure with expanded visitor stats and onlineSessions map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required frontend files, feature IDs, and components for visitor stats updates and polling behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend pages, components, and admin CMS utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color variables, themes, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script with favicon and metadata.
frontend/REDEPLOYMENT.md: Guide explaining how to rebuild, redeploy, and manually validate all frontend routes and admin media functionality.
frontend/src/admin/AdminGuard.tsx: Protects admin routes by checking session state and optionally bypassing auth for debugging.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Provides the admin dashboard layout with navigation, logout handling, and active nav highlighting.
frontend/src/admin/auth/adminSession.ts: Manages admin session storage, migration, cookies, and includes helpers for bypass sessions.
Enables a temporary authentication bypass and defines static bypass session info.
frontend/src/admin/components/AccessDeni: Displays an access denied message with a link back to the admin login page.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminPageH: Renders a reusable admin page header with title, optional subtitle, and optional action area.
frontend/src/admin/components/BlogFormDi: Dialog for creating or editing blog posts, including image selection, comment management, and form state handling.
frontend/src/admin/components/ConfirmDel: Reusable confirmation dialog for delete actions with customizable text and loading state.
Generic CRUD table component with optional search, published status column, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/admin/components/media/Medi: Media management panel with search, listing, deletion, and error handling for media assets.
Dialog component to browse, search, and select media assets with loading and error states.
Upload button that reads a selected file as data URL and creates a media asset via mutation.
frontend/src/admin/components/PromotionF: Dialog form for creating or editing promotions with fields for text, dates, image selection, and publish status.
frontend/src/admin/components/Testimonia: Dialog form for creating or editing testimonials including customer info, review fields, rating, image selection, and publish toggle.
frontend/src/admin/components/VehicleFor: Complex vehicle creation/edit dialog supporting basic details, media, pricing, specs, variants, and commercial feature fields.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/C: Checkbox editor for toggling boolean commercial vehicle feature flags.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/T: Form editor for technical specs with fields and dynamic additional features list management.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/V: Editor for adding, editing, and deleting vehicle variants with feature lists and premium flag.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminCmsQuer: React Query hooks wrapping admin CMS CRUD operations requiring a session token.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminLoginDe: Empty placeholder export kept for compatibility; no functional code.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminSession: Hook managing admin authentication, validating stored sessions, handling emergency bypass, and providing login logic.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminLoginDebug: Debug interface that tests admin login by calling adminLogin and displaying raw results.
Admin login form handling authentication via useAdminSession, with emergency bypass redirect logic.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminProfilePag: Page for viewing and editing the admin user's profile using fetch and save profile hooks.
frontend/src/admin/pages/BlogAdminPage.t: CMS page for listing, searching, creating, editing, and deleting blog posts with CRUD dialogs.
frontend/src/admin/pages/DashboardPage.t: Dashboard showing counts of vehicles, promotions, testimonials, blogs, contacts, and credit simulations.
Displays and manages contacts and credit simulations with search, deletion, and error handling.
frontend/src/admin/pages/MediaManagerPag: Shows media assets, upload controls, and an auth-error alert if the session is invalid.
frontend/src/admin/pages/PromotionsAdmin: Lists, searches, creates, edits, and deletes promotions using a CRUD table and form dialog.
frontend/src/admin/pages/TestimonialsAdm: Provides CRUD management for testimonials with search, edit, and delete workflows.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VehiclesAdminPa: Manages vehicles with category filtering, search, and CRUD operations via a table and form.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VisitorStatsAdm: Displays real-time visitor statistics in cards with loading and error states.
frontend/src/admin/styles/adminTheme.css: Defines admin-specific CSS variables and styles for layout, navigation, tables, cards, and buttons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the full public and admin routing structure using TanStack Router, wiring layouts and pages for each route.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogComment: Form component for creating or replying to blog comments with validation and reset handling.
Renders nested blog comments with reply support and conditional reply forms.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogInterac: Displays like, share, and comment actions for a blog post with local like tracking and tooltips.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Contact form that collects user details, validates required fields, submits data, and resets on success.
frontend/src/components/forms/CreditSimu: Form for submitting credit simulation requests with validation, API mutation, and reset on success.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: React error boundary that catches rendering errors and displays a fallback UI with a refresh button.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing dealer info, contact details, social media links, and visitor stats.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Public page layout combining navbar, hero, main content, CTA sections, and footer with visitor tracking.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Mobile bottom bar offering call, WhatsApp, credit simulation, and navigation menu popover.
frontend/src/components/navigation/MainM: Bottom sheet navigation menu listing main site routes for mobile.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Navba: Top navigation bar with responsive menu, route links, and WhatsApp contact button.
frontend/src/components/public/SectionTi: Utility component rendering a section title with an icon.
frontend/src/components/sections/BottomC: CTA section encouraging users to contact via WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Simple hero banner welcoming users with title and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/vehicles/Vehicle: Card displaying vehicle image, details, price, features, and actions for detail view or consultation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, reinitializing it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, logout, and identity loading via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as vehicles, promotions, blog posts, interactions, and contacts.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorTracking.ts: Tracks unique visitors and page views using sessionStorage and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark mode tokens, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post, tracking views and enabling likes, shares, and comments with reactive updates.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Lists all blog posts with images and summaries, linking to individual blog detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehicleDeta: Shows detailed information for a commercial vehicle with liking, sharing, and interaction tracking.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehiclesPag: Lists commercial vehicles, groups them by type, and displays them with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form and detailed contact info including map, consultant details, and business hours.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows featured vehicles, a CTA banner, about section, vehicle search, and latest blog posts.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehicleDetai: Displays detailed info for a passenger vehicle with variants, price, liking, and sharing actions.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehiclesPage: Lists all published passenger vehicles with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/PromoPage.tsx: Displays current promotions with images, descriptions, valid dates, and terms.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Renders customer testimonials with ratings, images, and reviews.
frontend/src/redeploy/routeSmoke.ts: Defines public and admin routes for smoke testing and utilities for checklist generation and route validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing them from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, containers, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing architecture, constraints, known issues, and existing features for the automotive website system.
